# ğŸª™ Proposal 2 â€” Treasury Transparency v1.1  
**ğŸ¦ Establishing DAO-Verified Multisig & Reporting Framework**  
*Investor Edition Â· v1.1 â€” Prepared by IO Beats DAO Co-Founders*

---

## ğŸŒ Purpose  
This proposal launches **Phase 1** of the IO Beats DAO Treasury Transparency Framework, establishing on-chain accountability through verified Safes, audited fund flows, and public reporting.  
It also sets the foundation for **Phase 2**, covering Yield Management & Vesting Governance modules.

---

## ğŸ“Š Objectives  
âœ… Confirm the **DAO Treasury Multisig** on all active chains :  

- **Ethereum :** [0xA2952C5F625e59E21012FB92A8D8269Fdb324554](https://app.safe.global/home?safe=eth:0xA2952C5F625e59E21012FB92A8D8269Fdb324554)   
  *Verified by IO Beats DAO â€” 4/7 Multisig*  
- **BNB Chain :** [0xF460231ACC9C5Fe80CdCC074022c43a5AF59fF06](https://app.safe.global/home?safe=bnb:0xF460231ACC9C5Fe80CdCC074022c43a5AF59fF06)   
  *Verified by IO Beats DAO â€” 4/7 Multisig*  
- **Base :** [0xC5086e22eb99A90F345c0b6602b09b1032bb1aB6](https://app.safe.global/home?safe=base:0xC5086e22eb99A90F345c0b6602b09b1032bb1aB6)   
  *Verified by IO Beats DAO â€” 4/7 Multisig*  
- **Polygon :** [0xDce35f5F9aB98c6dd671b15Fb23602f67E296c0B](https://app.safe.global/home?safe=matic:0xDce35f5F9aB98c6dd671b15Fb23602f67E296c0B)  
  *Verified by IO Beats DAO â€” 4/7 Multisig*  
- **Arbitrum :** [0x4B78FB95f7c2e0122356a73D8AAEB5AaF220d38C](https://app.safe.global/home?safe=arb1:0x4B78FB95f7c2e0122356a73D8AAEB5AaF220d38C)  
  *Verified by IO Beats DAO â€” 4/7 Multisig*


âœ… Approve **quarterly transparency reports** published on [GitHub](https://github.com/iobeatss/treasury/tree/main/docs/transparency)  
âœ… Link **on-chain analytics dashboards** via [Dune](https://dune.com/iobeats_dao)  
âœ… Empower the **Treasury & Yield Management Working Group** to manage stable reserves and deploy yield strategies (Beefy Finance, Gamma Strategies etc.)

---

## ğŸ•“ Reporting Timeline  
Quarterly reports will be published at the end of each fiscal quarter :  
**January Â· April Â· July Â· October**  
Each report includes multi-chain balances, Dune analytics charts, and audit references.

## ğŸ—³ï¸ Vote Options  
ğŸŸ¢ **Activate DAO Transparency Mode**

---

## ğŸ§¾ Verification Proof  
All listed multisig addresses have been independently verified on-chain via Safe Global and cross-checked with the IO Beats DAO Co-Signers Registry (October 2025).  
Audit confirmation : [Cyberscope Report â€” IOB Treasury](https://www.cyberscope.io/audits/iob)

---

## âš–ï¸ Legal Notice & DAO Disclaimer  
**Â© 2025 IO Beats DAO. All rights reserved.**  
This proposal forms part of the official IO Beats DAO governance process.  
Funds and decisions remain under collective multisig control as defined by the DAO Constitution and Bylaws.  

By voting, members acknowledge that :  
- On-chain votes are final and binding.  
- All funds are managed transparently through the verified Safes listed above.  
- IO Beats DAO assumes no liability for individual investment outcomes.  
- IO Beats DAO operates in alignment with the **Ethereum Foundation open-source ethos** and decentralized governance principles.  

For transparency reports, audits and legal terms, visit [iobeats.com](https://iobeats.com).

---

body:
![IO Beats Banner](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/iobeatss/iobeats-logo-assets/main/hero1.gif)

# ğŸ§© Genesis Proposal #001 â€” The Birth of iO Beats DAO
**Status:** Pending Â· **Author:** 0x470c...5899 Â· **Space:** iobeats.eth

---

## ğŸŒ The Beginning
From the first beat to the blockchain â€” **iO Beats** is not just a platform, itâ€™s a movement.  
This proposal marks the **activation of iO Beats DAO**, empowering artists, fans, and builders to co-create the decentralized music ecosystem of the future.

---

## ğŸ§  Mission
> â€œ**Give every artist and listener a voice, a vote, and a share** in the next generation of music.â€

The **iO Beats DAO** merges DeFi, music, and community governance into one transparent system.  
Holding **$IOB** gives each member real participation power in shaping the projectâ€™s evolution.

---

## ğŸª™ Proposal â€” What This Vote Does
- âœ… Activate DAO under **ENS:** `iobdao.eth`
- âœ… Confirm **$IOB** as the official multichain governance token
- âœ… Recognize **Multisig Treasury Safe** (`0xc5086E22eB99A90F345c0b6602b09B1032bb1aB6`) as the guardian for DAO-approved actions
- âœ… Launch initial **Working Groups:**
  - Treasury & Yield Management  
  - Marketing & Partnerships  
  - Music Curation & NFT Integration
- âœ… Open forum for **community proposals**, staking initiatives, and cross-chain expansion

---

## ğŸ—³ï¸ Choices
- ğŸŸ¢ **FOR:** Activate DAO and governance now  
- ğŸ”´ **AGAINST:** Oppose current activation structure or timing  
- âšª **ABSTAIN:** Observe without voting in this genesis round

ğŸ‘‰ **Vote here:** [https://snapshot.box/#/s:iobdao.eth](https://snapshot.box/#/s:iobdao.eth)

---

## âš–ï¸ Legal & Governance Disclosure
This vote is **symbolic and foundational**.  
No financial transactions, token distributions, or treasury operations occur during this proposal.

**iO Beats DAO** functions as a **community-governed framework** coordinated through off-chain voting (**Snapshot**) and executed on-chain by its **multisig Treasury Safe**.  
Participation does **not** represent an equity stake, financial investment, or formal partnership.  
All members act voluntarily under a decentralized governance model.

The **$IOB** token represents **governance and voting rights**, not ownership or profit participation in any registered entity.  
All treasury actions, partnerships, and upgrades will require further DAO approval and transparent on-chain verification.

Security audits for smart contracts and core infrastructure are conducted by **[Cyberscope](https://www.cyberscope.io/audits/iob)** to ensure safety and transparency.

---

## âš ï¸ Legal Disclaimer
The information contained in this proposal is provided for **community governance and transparency purposes only**.  
It does **not** constitute financial advice, investment solicitation, or an offer of securities.  

By participating in this vote, you acknowledge that:
- All actions are performed on a voluntary, decentralized, and non-custodial basis;  
- The DAO and its contributors assume no liability for the outcome of votes or execution of community proposals;  
- $IOB tokens grant governance participation but **do not** confer legal ownership, revenue rights, or profit claims;  
- Participants are responsible for complying with applicable local laws and regulations when interacting with DAO mechanisms.

Any misuse, misrepresentation, or external reproduction of this proposal without DAO consent may violate applicable DAO intellectual property and community guidelines.

---

Together, we are building the sound of Web3.  
**Letâ€™s make history.**
